name: Mechordia
description:
Controls:

Z/C: Attack

Arrow Keys: Move

Your goal is to find all the batteries in the level to open the door to your father's lab.

This game was made as a project for a game development class. It's made in Pico-8 entirely from scratch. Most of the development time was spent developing my own tile-able map system. I would have done it differently today, but I'm proud of what I created.

Although I'm proud of the small song I made for this game, I realize I'm no musical artist, so if you find the music annoying you can press CTRL+M to mute the game.
